title: How Riot designed Kindred
body: Someone tell me I'm not the only one who thought this when I saw the reveal.

replies.body:
the irony is that Kindred was meant to be an original character :3
(why is people raging over this? it's a joke)
There is no irony, you are an idiot.
you have no chill. It was a joke.
How do you know it wasn't part of Riot's plan to have that splash art that way? Like a teaser, you know?

Q is showed with 'Ashe' jumping whilst shooting
W is showed with 'Warwick' appearing to prepare a strike
E is showed with an 'Ashe arrow' which slows enemies
I think we are on to something.
I thought it was going to be a pokemon type of champion

all must watch riven not allowed yes 


https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6GggY4TEYbk
